response.overview: Wilki are the 3rd Polish band invited by MTV to participate in a concert from the world-famous MTV Unplugged series.  The concert was recorded on February 27, Wilki performed 20 songs in special acoustic arrangements at Studio Buffo in Warsaw.  The list of songs includes "Elli Lama Sabachtani", "Son of the Blue Sky", "Bohema" or "Baśka". There was also a cover - Wilki performed their own version of "Heart of Gold" by Neil Young, and t one premiere song, which was created for MTV Unplugged.  According to tradition, the artists participating in "MTV Unplugged" invite special guests to the stage who perform selected songs with them. Wilki invited Kasia Kowalska to cooperate with the band leader - Robert Gawliński - performing the hit "Cień w Dolinie Mgieł" . The second artist was Reni Jusis, who played the piano and sang in the song "Beniamin".
response.title: Wilki: MTV Unplugged
